assessments.category: Paper/ Report/ Annotation, Reflection, Translation/ Interpretation
assessments.task_description:
Write a reflective report on your weekly translation assignments submitted between Weeks 3 and 6. The report should comprise:

  • a list of footnote comments you put on your translations, between 3 and 5 footnote comments on each translation, which form the basis of your discussions below;
  • a brief overall observation on your strengths and weaknesses in translating the assigned texts;
  • a discussion of specific source text comprehension issues and your observations about improvements, including strategies you have employed to resolve the issues (e.g. improved syntactic analysis); and
  • a discussion of specific target language writing issues and your observations about improvements, including strategies you have employed to resolve the issues (e.g. monitoring and editing methods).

Length: 800 and 1000 words, excluding the list of footnote comments

The report should be typed in 1.5 line spacing and use 12-point Calibri font. 

Statement on Generative AI & MT

This task has been designed to be challenging, authentic and complex. Whilst students may use AI and/or MT technologies, successful completion of assessment in this course will require students to critically engage in specific contexts and tasks for which artificial intelligence will provide only limited support and guidance. A failure to reference generative AI or MT use may constitute student misconduct under the Student Code of Conduct. To pass this assessment, students will be required to demonstrate detailed comprehension of their written submission independent of AI and MT tools.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Submit your work via Turnitin by the due date.

assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description:
Students are required to translate one English passage into Chinese/Japanese in Week 8 and translate one Chinese/Japanese passage into English in Week 13. Each translation passage is approximately 250 English words or equivalent characters long and will be available on Blackboard.

Statement on Generative AI & MT

This assessment task is to be completed in-person. The use of generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) or Machine Translation (MT) tools will not be permitted. Any attempted use of AI or MT may constitute student misconduct under the Student Code of Conduct.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Submit your translation via Turnitin upon conclusion of the in-class test. File name: Week8_TRIN7140_Surname and Week13_TRIN7140_Surname, respectively. Each page should have the course code, course title and your name at the top (set up a template). The translation should be typed in a 12-point font, double-spaced, and presented professionally.
